title: Wayfair | SDE-2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.E 
Years of Experience: 4.2
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at Product based Startup
Prev Comp : ~ 20L Fixed + ~ 2L Bonus
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 34L Fixed (32 Basic + 2 PF)
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock : 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 34L

Other details: No room for negotiation.
Should I accept this offer ?

title: PhonePe Software Engineer Salary | Help
content:
Education: BTech CSE, Tier 3
Years of Experience: Almost 3 (2 years 10 months)
Prior Experience: Mid size MNC
Current Compensation: 13L Fixed
Company: PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer (Flat Hierarchy)
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 25L (Excluding Gratuity and insurance)
Signing Bonus: 3L
Retenation Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 17L (25% for 4 years)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Others): 48L
First Year: 32.25L
WFH/WFO: 5 days Work from office
Benefits: Standard - Like PF, gratuity, insurance

Other details: 
Do not have any other offer inhand at the moment and have negotited once with HR
Expecting a similar offer from Walmart soon, will update here.
1) Is this good considering all details like prev comp. and everything?
2) Can i negotiate again once i have offer from Walmart if they are paying high? Not being greedy just want it fair.

BRANDDDDD > PAY > WLB
